checkDiagonalBotTop(char) - Method in class core.GameBoard
Checks over the Game Board diagonally from bottom to top to determine if the given player has four concurrent pieces.
checkDiagonalTopBot(char) - Method in class core.GameBoard
Checks over the Game Board diagonally from top to bottom to determine if the given player has four concurrent pieces.
checkHorizontal(char) - Method in class core.GameBoard
Checks over the Game Board horizontally to determine if the given player has four pieces in a row.
checkVertical(char) - Method in class core.GameBoard
Checks over the Game Board vertically to determine if the given player has four concurrent pieces in a column.
